durbanplasticwaste 0.1.1

    Examples

    Plastic types at beach and litterboom

    plastic_types.Rd

    Weight in kg of identified PET, PE, PP, PS, other plastic and other waste items.

    Usage

    plastic_types

    Format

    A tibble with 13 rows and 16 variables:#'

    date

    Collection date of the data

    place

    Place where the collection was done

    total

    Total amount of waste chategorized in kg.

    pet

    Amount of polyethylene terephthalate (PET) in kg.

    pe

    Amount of polyethylene (PE) in kg. During the sorting process HDPE and LDPE plastics were not distinguished.

    pp

    Amount of polypropylene (PP) in kg.

    ps

    Amount of polystyrene (PS) in kg.

    hdpe_pp

    Amount of high-density polyethylene (HDPE) and polypropylene (PP) combined weight in kg. During the sorting process these two plastics were not distinguished.

    other_plastics

    Amount of other plastics in kg. The category ‘Other plastics’ included plastics that couldn’t be identified by the scanner or plastics that are in such small amounts the weighing scale could not distinguish it.

    other_waste

    Amount of other waste in kg remaining at the end of the categorization.

    glass

    Amount of glass in kg.

    shoes

    Amount of shoes in kg.

    shoes_quantity

    Number of shoes found at the location. Surprisingly a lot of shoes were found. As they often consisted of a combination of different plastics then a separate category was made for shoes.

    bag_quantity

    Number of bags that where collected.

    beach

    Categorical variable showing whether the collection was done at the beach (TRUE) or at the a litterboom (FALSE).

    details

    Additional information about the sampled data.
